column3: â€œWow. This strain is crazy. It tastes of citrus very strongly and I love it.  It also smells really potent; it's almost like a dense citrus smell. The high was very exciting for my mind which made me laugh at the slightest out-of-place comments and at the same time was making my head heavy. I also note that I had the halo-head affect which is great. All in all, its a very conversational friendly high which stimulates ...â€

â€œPicked up in Seattle.  One of my favorite strains for a general feeling of calm.  Music and surroundings become more engrossing and wonderful probably for the first half hour after use.  After that for usually about the next 2 hours a calm persists, food continues to taste wonderful, and, unique to this strain for me, people all seem to be fascinatingly beautiful.  Comes down easy.â€

â€œOrange Crush from Chalice Farms THC 21.75% CBD 0.24%.  2 grams of bud came in a prepackaged  brown zip lock baggie. Aptly named, it smells like orange peel and pine with a soft, berry air lingering in the nostrils for a bit. Nice looking buds; lime and olive green and absolutely covered in orange hairs. Not very frosty but not without its sparkle either. 
Smoked in my old school double chamber metal pipe it smoked sm...â€

â€œVaped this during 4th of July weekend. While out camping this strain made me embrace the outdoors and definitely made me want to dance all night to the music we had on (Bloc Party). It's not that strong but definitely is a good head high and doesn't last too long which for me is a plus.â€

â€œğŸŠğŸ‹ Orange Crush is a nice and mild sativa-dominant hybrid that is great for anytime use. It really smells like an orange. It's the shotgun of citrus to your nose will leave you wondering if this is laced with pure orange oil. It produces a nice head high that isn't too intense and won't bog you down. It's great for those not looking to get too stoned, but want just enough to get some work done. I personally like to...â€
â€œFirst time I tried it, I felt like I was sitting next to Method Man. Great social strain, makes sitting around with friends entertaining. It will make you somewhat lazy.â€

â€œOrange Crush is a very social strain. I picked up an eighth of it after I asked the budtender what would be best to smoke before New Years. I was directed toward this strain and not disappointed! The taste was phenomenal! Very citrusy with a bit of an earthy hint. The buds were light green, super frosty, and very fluffy covered in long light orange hairs. The high was very social, heady, and happy. Also very long las...â€

â€œThis strain is a must have. best taste for the citrus strains. First hit will leave your mouth watering... at least until the cotton mouth kicks in. She is a fast flower 7.5 weeks for the most flavor. super chunky and full of tricromes.â€

â€œFirst weed I've ever smoked. I was 13 and me and my two good friends went all out on our first sesh and bought six grams of it. This bud had me really high I remeber bein a youngin and just looking into the rain down the street after the sesh was over with. I felt like I was in a movie or some shit lol. Damn I miss those days . Enjoy this euphoric creative high friends !â€

â€œWow! I've been a smoker for 27 years, grew up on the Big Island of Hawaii where there was a ton of flavorful strains but this one by Cannabiotix is by far the tastiest flower I have had the pleasure of smoking. Pure citrus through and through. The high is also top notch, starting with a happy euphoria then transitioning into a very relaxed state of mind, but not couch locked. Orange Crush just jumped into my top 5, p...â€

â€œThis is a bud that reinvigorates my passion for cannabis. Its sharp distinct orange soda smell smacked me in the face. It's not just citrus-y. It's distinctly Orange Crush. A smooth smoke that tastes as good as it smells and leave you feeling energetic and happy as hell. Perhaps climbing the ladder to the #1 strain. Tonight was good!â€
â€œGreat for listening to music and destressing.â€

â€œTOP THREE... ALL TIME... FOR FLAVOR & AROMA, (ORANGE, FLORAL SSSSTRONG FRESH ORANGE ON THE NOSE) AND TRUE MIRROR IMAGE OF ITS NAME, THIS TASTE LIKE A CAN OF ORANGE CRUSH SODA, ALMOST SLIGHTLY CARBONATED (love them smoky burps).  I Have a CRUSH on this strain, excellent for a walk in the sunshine, or for a rainy day, try it... you'll have a new crush too.â€

â€œI can't get enough of Orange Crush, what a killer daytime strain. Each time I have it is better than the last. It has a wonderful fruity aroma and a clean smooth hit. The high is perfect for starting your day and jammin some Jim Croce. Ya baby!â€

â€œNot to be confused with it's indica cousin Orange Kush; this hard hitting fruity delight, is a scrumptious sativa leaning gem that is truly a tokers' treasure. The first thing you will notice is the incredible smell coming from honey. It is reminiscent of those orange gummy type candies covered with sugar we all ate as a kid. This baby is covered with tricomes for its' own sugar" coating.  The smell does come throug...â€"

â€œIm definitely not new to cannibas or the effects it has. With thus being said I dont rate strains this high very often. Orange Crush is one of those flowers that reminds me why I love cannibas to begin with. Extraordinary taste like a smooth orande soda (especially if you add ice to your piece) a exspansive but not harsh smoke and beautiful buds. I really would recommended if your looking for something new.â€

â€œIm definitely not new to cannibas or the effects it has. With thus being said I dont rate strains this high very often. Orange Crush is one of those flowers that reminds me why I love cannibas to begin with. Extraordinary taste like a smooth orande soda (especially if you add ice to your piece) a exspansive but not harsh smoke and beautiful buds. I really would recommended if your looking for something new.â€

This baby is covered with tricomes for its' own sugar" coating.  The smell does come throug...â€"

â€œThis is now forever one of my favorite strains! Ever since I got this shit I just went straight up wiz kalifa and started rolling mad joints! Let me just say that a couple hits of this stuff will make you trip and feel awesome like you're a fucking dragon!â€

â€œupper middle grade of this strain. bought a half. when well cured this stuff is very citrus. if it doesn't smell a little citrus when you break the flower then it got dry or old.  nice chill high on this donation.  good for relaxing. low key activities. i really just enjoyed it for the smell and taste. the high was just ok for a head high, but good body high and good for aches and pains. think messing around in the g...â€

â€œGood bud for the price.  I toked it for the first time last night after a long day and it effectively took all the stress and tension away.  Nice body buzz with a decent amount of head clarity.  After the high was over, it took me into sleep mode pretty quickly.  Don't think I'd use this one during the daytime, but not so much lockdown as maybe a full-blown Indica or Kush strain.  Citrusy smell when ground and holy c...â€

â€œGreat strain, got a cart of it and smoke it every night, starts off with a euphoric feel and giggles...at least for me, then goes into a calming chill high, and that last for about half an hour, then the sleepiness kicks in, but you can fight it if you want to, but if you want to sleep you can, and I get good sleep of this, like 9 or more hours, overall good nighttime strain, you can smoke it for social events if you...â€
â€œOrange Crush is definately a heady high.  Makes me a bit on the lazy side.  Good for meditating and deep thinking.  Nice orange taste.   A very good Hybrid for me.  I prefer Sativas.â€

â€œGave this a 2nd try and Im glad I did. I get alot of work done with this Sativa, it just makes me really talkative! But I got another big task with this med. Nice taste - Great Price - Great High!â€

â€œBeautiful hybrid strain! Buddy of mine dropped off about four 0.4-0.6g indoor nugs, and about 2g of some outdoor.

At first (even with the indoor stuff) I really couldn't detect more than a slightly sweet smell, however after keeping the indoor stuff in a small airtight container overnight it really brought out a beautiful sweet orange/grapefruit smell. 

Tasted earthy at first, but after a few hits you can really de...â€
â€œQuality strain of Marijuana served best with Orange Crush pop.â€
â€œGreat sativa! the taste has a citrus blast that will have your ass doin dishes in no time haha energizer medication, more than outdone yourself again Natures Cure thank you!!â€

â€œGave this a 2nd try and Im glad I did. I get alot of work done with this Sativa, it just makes me really talkative! But I got another big task with this med. Nice taste - Great Price - Great High!â€

â€œIf you enjoy sativa's I would highly recommend this strain. I was in a great mood and I was focused on getting
 stuff done. All in all this was a very potent but energetic strain that put me in a uplifted state of mind.â€

â€œFor all you creative types with synesthesia and ptsd -- this strain kicks ass! It is also super delicious. For me it doesn't cause a lot of anxiety at all. If you want to mellow her out, try mixing Orange Crush with her parent Blueberry. SO DELICIOUS!!!â€

â€œThe aroma is DELICIOUS. Best smelling kush I ever had. Smell like yummy citrus candy. Great for medical use. Alleviated my depression. Functional high. Didn't put me to sleep. However, it still allows u to sleep. Energized and happy mood overall. A great strain but nothing crazy.â€

â€œThis thing definitely tastes a little like orange soda.  Certainly a daytime strain.  Keeps you invigorated and clear eyed. Little similar to Tangie as well I think.  This is one of my favorites lately for when I get up and have to start the day.  One or two pen rips of some distillate and good to go.â€

â€œSo tasty!!!! Tangie may be the only strain that even remotely could hang with these terpenoids! Kind of like if you put a ton of ğŸŠ tic-tacs into a juicer and repeated the process bout four times!!! Almost too tasty but nope, that bitter thc bite always shows up at the end! Highly recommend this ğŸ›’- especially for daytime use, no smell, looks like an e-cigarette and is a sweet tasting SATIVA!! Crushes pain, crushes a...â€
â€œSlightly nice citrusy smell, but not very strong.â€
â€œA sweet tasting hybrid that is pretty strong and hits you full force about 7 minutes after you smoke. Pretty strong and isn't harsh at all.â€

â€œLove this strain! The high is a perfect mix of heady and energizing, like others have said, it won't glue you to the couch if taken in moderation, but still gives you a super chill buzz. Highly recommended.â€

â€œThe little strain that could! Really enjoyable but did not last long AT ALL. Taste was really good, vaped pretty consistently. I didn't expect much, so I was really impressed. Good manageable high. I really liked it for my depressionâ€

â€œsuper pungent overpowering orange smell, the nugs are small and lots of stems but the dankness makes up for it complete stress reliever had copped a 1/4 of this and a 1/4 of gdp i think this strain exceeds the strength of the gdp at least for me/â€
â€œhad this twice once at a party right before we went in everything felt so crazy in line and then at the movies a few hits and the world started wigglingâ€

â€œOne of my favorites, nice high where I get really talkative and less stressed. Munchies arenâ€™t too bad, Iâ€™m usually too lost in thought. Good active strain, makes you want to do things and think a lot.â€
â€œinteresting tasting with a good highâ€

â€œRip-roaring.  I analogize this to riding a Harley down PCH.  Thrilling, but a bit scary (edgy).  Very energetic, the feeling hits you like a blast, but not much else, in terms of tingly, or psychedelic.â€
â€œSlightly nice citrusy smell, but not very strong.â€

â€œLove this strain! The high is a perfect mix of heady and energizing, like others have said, it won't glue you to the couch if taken in moderation, but still gives you a super chill buzz. Highly recommended.â€

â€œThe little strain that could! Really enjoyable but did not last long AT ALL. Taste was really good, vaped pretty consistently. I didn't expect much, so I was really impressed. Good manageable high. I really liked it for my depressionâ€

â€œOne of my all time favourites. It's super citrusy smelling and tasting. The high is pretty strong and is great for social situations and having a good time. However if you smoke more, it's a great strain to trip out on. Something to start your night with.â€
â€œhad this twice once at a party right before we went in everything felt so crazy in line and then at the movies a few hits and the world started wigglingâ€
â€œMy absolute favorite strain.  The effects are just perfect for my mental condition.  Uplifting & tastes out of this world!â€

â€œLove this strain! The high is a perfect mix of heady and energizing, like others have said, it won't glue you to the couch if taken in moderation, but still gives you a super chill buzz. Highly recommended.â€
â€œWow! Wish I picked up more because I truly love this enough to write about it! Thick frosty dense nugs, great taste, great effects all around!â€

â€œSolid daytime or fun evening strain. Pretty much the Sunny D of Sativa Hybrids, with an immediate punch of bright, citrusy orange smoke that makes you think you've gone to Florida and plucked one off the tree. 

A very clear-headed Sativa side, with mental energy, light creativity, heightened sensory perception and visual bliss. You'll feel happy but not crazy or rowdy. More like, Yo
column4: all is right with the world

column3:
â€œI don't know how you guys managed to write coherent reviews after smoking this strain.
I haven't been this stoned since high school.
This is a wonderful bud. A nice, intense, happy buzz.â€

â€œI liked orange crush. I heard it was medical marijuana from Colorado. The high was good, I was relaxed and happy. And ofcourse hungry lolâ€

â€œThis is a daytime winner for me. This can be used for ADD/ADHD, actually every strain I've tried with orange works well for it. I give Orange Crush an 8 out of 10 on the helpful for ADD/ADHD scale. Sometimes it's hard to get a great taste profile when dabbing but that's not the case with Orange Crush. A full thick smoke loaded with streams of orange surrounded by a balanced mix of berry and citrus. Such a complete ta...â€

â€œnot bad, but also nothing overwhelming - despite the taste =) very intensive and delicious, with green oranges in the beginning before turning to herbs and woods... effects are pleasantly cheerful to heavily couch locking and whacking, but side effects are also pretty present with tension and headache... would smoke it again for the aroma, but effects alone aren't worth it.â€

â€œIt was an amazing weed strain! If you have the chance to get it, do! It gave me a amazing body high and I felt relaxed yet upbeat. I would use a tropical blunt rap or even drink something fruity; It will enhance the taste.â€

â€œlots of hairs! that's what i could remember. Great stress reliever makes you feel happy and calm. a small amount of this strain and your good for a good while and will hit you all at once. great taste too.â€
â€œSlightly nice citrusy smell, but not very strong.â€
â€œHelped tremendously with my nausea. Tastes amazing and is a great body relaxer. The high is really mellow and enjoyable.â€

â€œColor alone was sublime, paired with the indulgent fruity aroma Orange Crush will win your heart before you even consume it. Upon consumption I found it gave an uplifted, but kind of spacey high. Perfect for curing Da Blues." It also had a (natural) citrus flavor I haven't experienced with any other strain yet. If you have the opportunity
â€œI have some OC shatter and it's a nice mellow high. Great for pain but might not help nausea as it can cause you to feel a bit woozy if you over-medicate.â€

â€œLove this strain! The high is a perfect mix of heady and energizing, like others have said, it won't glue you to the couch if taken in moderation, but still gives you a super chill buzz. Highly recommended.â€

â€œIn the days where strain names and effects can be as ambiguous as your porn name (Pet/Street).  Orange Crush is everything you want and expect it to be.  It has a great citrusy nose that will take you back to eating orange slices during pee wee soccer half time. It's clear and energetic effects will have you ready to take on The Purple People Eaters or Green Machine in the 2nd half!â€
â€œThis is in my top 5 as of right now, great weed to start the day off with.â€

â€œOrange Crush reminded me of California Orange Bud. Dense, tight nugs. Citrus aroma, earthy taste. Somewhat harsh smoke for a Sativa dominant. This strain has a nice cerebral buzz, however it fades to a sleepy feeling. Not a typical jump up and clean the room" Sativa
column4: but overall a nice smoke. I found this bud was best smoked from a pipe or bong. Dense sticky buds made it harder to roll.â€"

column3: â€œVery relaxing, chill strain. Very hairy and orange of course. smells like oranges. still leaves you high functioning, so you can talk to people and do stuff well. Perfect if you wanna chill the fuck out! :)â€
â€œOne Of My Favorite Daytime Blends! Great Easy Head High That Just Leaves Me Feeling Clear, Focused, and HELLA Alert lol. A Little Bit Of A Bite At Times But Typically Smooth And Citrusy.â€
â€œLives up to the name with many orange hair. Soft, breakable buds. One of the better flavored strains. A solid, medium priced daytime smoke.â€

â€œMy cut of Orange Crush from the SFV Patients Care in Canoga Park was very enjoyable indeed! Dense, colorful, and tangerine berry. This particular donation was a nicely balanced, happy, cheerful, yet pretty decent, relaxing and busy, good time. Definitely a tasty Sativa dominant hybrid, not recommended for Indica loving expectations. But if you require that happy functionality, a good grow of the Orange Crush will mak...â€
â€œOrange Crush is superb! One of my new favorite strains.â€
â€œA sweet tasting hybrid that is pretty strong and hits you full force about 7 minutes after you smoke. Pretty strong and isn't harsh at all.â€
â€œModerate high with a sweet flavor. Definitely doesn't hit like some other hybrids.â€
â€œgood mood strand, made me happy and giggly mostlyâ€

â€œTime slowed down after 10 minutes of inhaling... and started repeating itself eventually. It was a very terrifying experience. What was actually a couple of seconds felt like a timeless and repetitive sensation. Freaked me out, I wanted to call an ambulance! This lasted for 40 minutes roughly... Apparently itâ€™s common to feel this when high, but Iâ€™m new to this so I tripped balls like I never would have imagined. Hig...â€
â€œNice and relaxed but still talkative and energeticâ€

â€œThis is a light smoke with orange and citrus flavours. It gives me a nice uplifting and happy high without feeling hazy whatsoever, this due to the low thc levels. Very easy to be productive. Once the high is over, it wont even feel like you've smoked anything prior. I save this for morning/day use.â€
â€œAwesome. Makes my lips tingle.â€

â€œThis is a light smoke with orange and citrus flavours. It gives me a nice uplifting and happy high without feeling hazy whatsoever, this due to the low thc levels. Very easy to be productive. Once the high is over, it wont even feel like you've smoked anything prior. I save this for morning/day use.â€

â€œOrange Crush from Golden Leaf Wellness is sooo good! From its awesome citrus smell to heavy head high, it's effects will have you feeling quite spoiled. Go get some..they are on the last jar and it's on sale. dank.â€
â€œAwesome. Makes my lips tingle.â€

â€œJust took a puff. Feels like someone is massaging my temples. It lights up the solar plexus shakra. Not sure what color that is though, orange? Now feels like someone is scratching the back of my head. Makes me very focused and a little serious but still joking. Kind of like adderal. Damn, now it is dancing with my heart shakra. Wowee feels good. Why pay for a $100 an hour massage when you can get some Orange Crush?â€
â€œDelicious. Very sweet smelling and it hit perfectly. Good, strong, full-body high.â€
â€œa great flavourful bud that delivers a uplifting sativa effect despite being a hybrid strainâ€
â€œWonderful. Definitely try walking"â€"

â€œBy far one of my favorite Sativas out there. The sweet, citrus aroma excites your senses, and don't worry, the buds may be small, but the density of those trichomes will get you. If you're Feelin' a bit down or wanna get some euphoria in you, get crushed with Orange Crush.â€

Either way, it does have really strong cerebral and psychedelic effects that are more common to sativas, complementing the thoroughly relaxing, warm 'n' fuzzy body high, which lasts an exceptionall...â€

The flavour (vaped) has strong Orange sweet and citrusy flavour honestly the flavour alone is worth it.

I never buy more than ...â€
